prompts: Create a beautiful butterfly Pokemon with striking yellow and gray wings.
Imagine a graceful bug Pokemon that flutters through flower-filled meadows.
Show me a whimsical insect-like creature with vibrant colors and an enchanting look.
Generate a flying-type Pokemon that embodies elegance and beauty with its design.
Design a stunning Pokemon that thrives in lush forests and has delicate wings.
Give me an image of a colorful Pokemon that is both cute and majestic.
Make a Pokemon with an intricate wing pattern and a charming personality.
